title: National school poll reveals American support for DEI, Dept. of Education - but not AI
description: Confidence in American public schools has dropped to an all-time low, according to a national survey that also showed support for diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives in the school system and resistance to artificial intelligence in the classroom.

title: AI knowledge now a factor in hiring for most PH firms

content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly reshaping industries, with 72 percent of businesses in the Philippines now factoring AI knowledge into their hiring decisions, according to a new report from jobs portal JobStreet by SEEK.

title: Agentic AI has companies excited and security experts freaked out
description: Eight in 10 corporations now use artificial intelligence agents. But security researchers keep finding how easily they're manipulated.

title: Saudi startup launches world's first halal AI fluent in Arabic and Islamic culture
description: Saudi Arabia has entered the global artificial intelligence race with the launch of Humain Chat, a new Arabic-first chatbot designed to show the culture, language and values of the region.

title: Hong Kong wealth fund, Beijing AI academy team up to hunt for global AI talent
description: Hong Kong’s US$8 billion start-up investment fund partners with the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence in a new talent initiative.
content:
